channel.title: Need Help PortForwarding!
channel.description: i run my server it says online my compile is successfull i can get on my server without putting a ip but my friends or other people cant get on my server ip is chaos-pking.no-ip.biz plz help if u know add reissround1@msn.com

item.title: Need Help PortForwarding!
item.dc:creator: @kiamyhelp kiamyhelp
item.description:
@kiamyhelp wrote:

go to your firewall then go to add port.

put your server in and your port.

makesure u have your no-ip.

go to your source and hit runserver

You have to put your server ip in to connect with your friends which need to use the same ip u use.

if u have a linksys router. put your ip or gateway(i forget) in your url bar.

box will pop up and you have to put a password in . should be admin or 123 .

go to applications and gaming. then port range forwarding.

for application put whatever you want.

for port put 43594-43594 then . hit tcp and put your last digits of your ip in the last box.

i typed this fast if i missed anything im sorry

Read full topic
